Not-seasonally adjusted claims tell the real story of the economic damage caused by #COVID19 because they reflect the actual number of people who filed for UI. 

It‚Äôs important to get the numbers right so policymakers can provide Americans with the support they need and deserve.
Not-seasonally adjusted claims can be more easily added to the number of claims filed under the PUA program, since that number is not-seasonally adjusted as well.

In order to gain a better understanding of the extent of the economic damage presented by #COVID19, we must count Americans who have filed claims under the new Pandemic Unemployment Assistance (PUA) program for gig workers and others who don‚Äôt qualify for regular UI benefits.

Seasonal adjustment makes it easier to spot changes beyond those that typically occur during the particular season. But with massive job losses due to #COVID19, the adjustment has inflated the claims figures substantially‚Äîby 3 million over the past 8 weeks. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYfquz9X0AA5h4H.jpg

Not-seasonally adjusted = the actual number of people who filed a claim the previous week.

Seasonally adjusted = the number of people who filed a claim the previous week adjusted for well-known seasonal patterns, such as hiring of retail workers during the holiday season.

Check out a new @JECDems brief on why using the actual number of unemployment claims filed each week, rather than the seasonally adjusted number, is more useful during periods with massive layoffs as in the #COVID19 crisis.

Global economic integration now amped up and pursued for its own sake. Nat security, domestic needs, & liberalizing agenda diverge. Consequences for USA not so good. This system facilitated the ‚ÄúChina shock,‚Äù which has had major security implications as well as economic ones

Uruguay Round marks significant departure. Industries & sectors formerly outside GATT rules now brought in. And the largely advisory dispute resolution process of GATT replaced w/ binding WTO process, complete w/ appellate body able to rely on its own decisions as precedent

This is why GATT left such large areas of economy & industry untouched, and allowed nations such wide latitude in domestic regulation. It was never trade liberalizing or integration just for the sake of integration

And my claim has been that in important respects, Bretton Woods, GATT placed the first in service to the second. Trade was meant to serve the end goals of national economic strength & domestic stability among member states
